title: Vulnerability Summary Schema
description: Schema for AI-generated vulnerability summaries with strict formatting and prioritization rules.

summary.description: Main summary of what was asked in the prompt for the sent information (under 50 words). Must be concise and non-redundant and non-generic. Use surrounding context for more relevant response.

items.description: Actionable item based on the summary, prompt and the surrounding context provided. Must be concise and non-redundant.

actionable_items.description: List of actionable items based on the summary and what to do next based on what is asked in the prompt. Each item should be a concise action that can be taken based on the summary provided.

explaination.description: Explaination of the selected text without repeating the summary. Must be concise and non-redundant. Use surrounding context for more relevant response.
